attributes.description: Track NTFS USN Journal file system changes focusing on creation, deletion, and rename operations of executables and scripts in suspicious locations
attributes.query: SELECT action, category, old_path, path, record_timestamp, drive_letter FROM ntfs_journal_events WHERE (action IN ('FILE_CREATE', 'FILE_DELETE', 'RENAME_OLD_NAME', 'RENAME_NEW_NAME')) AND (path LIKE '%\Users\%\AppData\%' OR path LIKE '%\Temp\%' OR path LIKE '%\Users\Public\%' OR path LIKE '%\ProgramData\%' OR path LIKE '%\Users\%\Desktop\%' OR path LIKE '%\Users\%\Downloads\%') AND (path LIKE '%.exe' OR path LIKE '%.dll' OR path LIKE '%.ps1' OR path LIKE '%.bat' OR path LIKE '%.cmd' OR path LIKE '%.vbs' OR path LIKE '%.zip') AND record_timestamp > datetime('now', '-7 days') ORDER BY record_timestamp DESC LIMIT 500;
